sentence.Network_en: In have penknife, bottle opener, peeler, all - powerful handle, kitchen chopping board!
sentence.Network_cn: 里面配有小刀, 开瓶器, 削皮器, 万能柄, 砧板!

sentence.Network_cn: 削皮, 切片,提核一次完成,简单方便,家庭的好帮手.

sentence.Network_en: A doohickey is an apple corer, peeler and slicer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是个集(果实)去心, 削皮和切片为一体的小装置.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (originally denoting a member of the Irish constabulary): from the name of Sir Robert Peel

entry.def: A peeler is a special tool used for removing the skin from fruit and vegetables.

means.word_mean: 1. a performer who provides erotic entertainment by undressing to music
2. a worker who peels the skins from fruits and vegetables
3. a device for peeling vegetables or fruits;

auth_sentence.content: Use a potato peeler to peel the cucumber.
